scripts.start: npm --prefix ./Client/ run build-pro && cd Server/ && dotnet build --source Keyboardchat.csproj --configuration Release --output Build/netcoreapp3.1/ && npm start
scripts.start-dev: npm --prefix ./Client/ run build-dev && cd Server/ && dotnet build --source Keyboardchat.csproj --configuration Debug --output Build/netcoreapp3.1/ && npm start
scripts.build-server: cd Server/ && dotnet build --source Keyboardchat.csproj --configuration Debug --output Build/netcoreapp3.1/
scripts.install: cd Server/ && npm install && cd ../Client/ && npm install
scripts.startdb: cd Server/UniServerZ/ && UniController.exe start_mysql && UniController.exe start_apache
scripts.stopdb: cd Server/UniServerZ/ && UniController.exe stop_mysql && UniController.exe stop_apache
